drinks.name: GG
drinks.recipe: Pour the Galliano liqueur over ice. Fill the remainder of the glass with ginger ale and thats all there is to it. You now have a your very own GG.

drinks.name: A1
drinks.recipe: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, mix and serve over ice into a chilled glass.

drinks.name: Kir

pour kaluha, then Baileys, then Frangelico not chilled and not layered -- SERVE!!!
Add both ingredients to shot glass, shoot, and get drunk quick

drinks.name: Ace
drinks.recipe: Shake all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker and ice then strain in a cold glass.

drinks.name: Adam
drinks.recipe: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

drinks.name: B-53
drinks.recipe: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52

drinks.name: AT&T
drinks.recipe: Pour Vodka and Gin over ice, add Tonic and Stir
